project.description: Build a vmdk image from a raw disk image. Includes: -Adding vmware,vbox tools -Adding grub boot loader -Converting img to vmdk Input is /mnt/image.img Output is /mnt/image.vmdk

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: svn export --force https://vappio.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/vappio/trunk/img-conf/boot /mnt/boot pushd /mnt tar cvzf grub-boot.tgz boot popd cd /mnt cp /mnt/image.img /mnt/image.img.vmbundle sudo /opt/vappio-util/vp-runonimg /mnt/image.img.vmbundle /opt/vappio-util/cleanupimg sudo /opt/vappio-util/vp-runonimg /mnt/image.img.vmbundle /opt/vappio-install/recipes/vmware.sh sudo /opt/vappio-util/vp-runonimg /mnt/image.img.vmbundle /opt/vappio-install/recipes/vbox.sh sudo /opt/vappio-util/vp-create-vmdk /mnt/image.img.vmbundle /mnt/grub-boot.tgz /mnt/image.vmdk
